front.div:
TCR MART-1-PE Staining Kits contain TCR MART-1 reagent labeled
with PE, Peptide Loading Enhancer (Cat. # PLE-001), HLA-A2.1 control
cells loaded with MART-1:26-35(27L) peptide (positive control) (Cat. #
CA2-AE1-1000) and HLA-A2.1 control cells-no peptide (negative
control) (Cat. # CA2-XC1-1000).
REAGENT SPECIFICITY
MHC Allele: HLA-A*0201
Peptide: Human MART-1/MelanA :26-35(27L) analog: ELAGIGILTV
DESCRIPTION
STAR™ multimers are recommended for use in identification and
quantification of peptide/MHC complexes on the surface of cells and
tissues and for identification, enumeration and tracing of specific antigen
presenting cells. STAR™ multimers consist of soluble recombinant
single chain TCR protein that has been biotinylated and multimerized
with labeled streptavidin (1). The TCR MART-1 reagent contains a high
affinity TCR recognizing MART-1:26-35(27L)/HLA-A2.1 complexes.
Binding to MART-1:27-35 (AAGIGILTV)/HLA-A2.1 complexes on
peptide-loaded antigen presenting cells is also detectable but requires
higher concentrations of loaded peptide.
USAGE
